name: slippers for absolute beginners
sizes_available: small - 8 double crochet to start; medium - 10 double crochet to start; large - 12 double crochet to start
notes:
**super easy crochet slippers for adults – beginner-friendly pattern**

create your coziest, custom-fit slippers with this super easy crochet pattern! perfect for beginners and experienced crocheters looking for a quick project, this pattern uses simple double crochet stitches and a 6mm hook to craft comfy, stylish slippers in no time.

**features include:**
 * **customizable sizing**: includes instructions for small, medium, and large sizes.
 * **yarn versatility**: works great with acrylic, chenille, or a combination of both for extra squish and comfort.
 * **step-by-step instructions**: written in plain english – no crochet jargon!
 * **quick and practical**: a fast project that’s perfect for gifting, personal use, or selling at craft fairs.

these slippers are designed for ultimate comfort, with no bulky stitches underfoot. start today and enjoy creating something cozy and functional!

✅ free pattern  https://bit.ly/4gfokmm 
✅ printable pdf pattern  https://bit.ly/3prj60d
✅ right handed tutorial  https://youtu.be/ljsqufkxcae
✅ left handed tutorial  https://youtu.be/h-rr0lz4o8y
